website_summaries.verdict: Sony's Cyber-shot DSC-W370 is an inexpensive compact camera with a long lens; however, its shutter lag and low-light photo quality keep it from earning a higher rating.
pros: 7x zoom lens in a compact body

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was horrible
customer_reviews.text: Was shown in box did not come in box did not even come close to the day it said it would when I purchased it I understand that with vivid there is shipping issues but don’t post it will come on a certain when someone purchases it and it comes cv over a week later nor should you have shown the item In the box when it doesn’t come in the box
customer_reviews.author: cathy thomas

customer_reviews.title: Camera takes bad pictures and takes forever
customer_reviews.text: This camera is worse than a cell phone and it takes about 2-3 seconds for every single picture
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPrime is#1

customer_reviews.title: used camera
customer_reviews.text: a little touchy but once I got use to it I like it
customer_reviews.author: JP Colcord

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera with nice features for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I researched many different brands and models of cameras before purchasing this Sony Cyber Shot and and very happy with my purchase. Great camera with great features for the price. Real nice quality photos , and I am certainly an amatuer photographer !
customer_reviews.author: sdcarol

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is working like new. Good price. I like it for easy snap shots.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Not as decribed
customer_reviews.text: Not as shown. No box, no sd card, no cable to download pics to computer, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: kris pote

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am not a camera genius, but I needed to replace my 10 year old digital with a simple, easy, low maintenance point and shoot. I recently moved and needed something to take along while hiking. The camera is thin and small enough to fit in my pocket while roaming the woods. The pictures I have taken so far have come out wonderful and the speed from turning on to ready is great. This camera fit my budget and was exactly what I was looking for. I still have a lot to learn about the other functions, but the ones I have used have been great
customer_reviews.author: MedDevGuy

customer_reviews.title: It was like new! Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent condition! I was really pleased with everything about this camera. The battery, charger and other cords were all included.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Davidson

customer_reviews.title: bad
customer_reviews.text: The mode selector is rubbish It only changes at any time. I've done everything and still the same Immediately seized him, began failure. Seller is other trash. He knew the fault and not comment anything. Swindler, irresponsible.
customer_reviews.author: Jefferson Valverde

customer_reviews.title: In a bad condition
customer_reviews.text: I bought some of this items, but one of them is in really bad condition. A problem with the lens, they are very dark. It is not a problem of configuration, I know about photography, it is a problem of the lens
customer_reviews.author: J. Paladines

customer_reviews.title: nice camera, but little annoyances like this adds up ...
customer_reviews.text: Sony knows the clip that is SUPPOSE to hold the battery in will be the VERY FIRST THING TO BREAK!!!!. Have they fixed this beyond irritating problem with this camera? The little piece that is suppose to hold the battery and SD card was the 2nd to go...nice camera, but little annoyances like this adds up to big ones.....
customer_reviews.author: judy zappettini/beaver
